授業概要・カリキュラム上の位置づけ: The purpose　of　this　course　is　to　familiarize　students　with　the　TOEIC　exam　and　to　provide　strategies and relevant vocabulary　as　well as ample　practice　to　help　students　achieve　a　good　score　on　the　exam.　　The　TOEIC　exam　is　designed　to　test one's　ability　to　understand　English　as　it　is　used　in　international　business　and　other　professional　situations.  Students who plan to take this course should have at least a high intermediate level of English.
授業方法: This course will be conducted on an on-demand online basis.  Each week, an assignment package will be uploaded, and students will be required to complete the assignment and submit it online.  Students will have ample opportunity to have written communication with and get feedback from the instructor online.
到達目標: Students will be taught completely in English and will focus on the Listening Comprehension section of the TOEIC exam.
授業計画・課題に対するフィードバック: Class 1	Overview of Listening Comprehension sectionClass 2	Photograph questionsClass 3	Photograph questions (continued)Class 4	Question-ResponseClass 5	Question-Response (continued)Class 6	Question-Response (continued)Class 7	Short ConversationsClass 8	Short Conversations (continued)Class 9	Short Conversations (continued)Class 10 Short TalksClass 11 Short Talks (continued)Class 12 Short Talks (continued)Class 13 Test PracticeClass 14 Test PracticeClass 15 Test Practice
準備学習内容・時間の目安: To prepare for this course, students should first visit the official TOEIC website (http://www.ets.org/toeic) and learn more about the test itself.  Students should also plan to spend at least 30 minutes after each lesson reviewing the grammar, vocabulary, and strategies introduced in the lesson.
成績評価の方法: Students’ grades are based on the satisfactory completion and quality of the assignments.
テキスト: Barron's TOEIC: Test of English for International Communication (8th edition)　Barron's Educational Series
